players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Keep an eye on Charlie, as he seems suspicious."
Charlie: "Bob is the Mafioso, I am not. We should lynch him."
Diana: "Bob is not the Mafioso, I think Charlie might be. We should lynch him."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Keep an eye on Charlie, as he seems suspicious."
You: "Bob is the Mafioso, I am not. We should lynch him."
Diana: "Bob is not the Mafioso, I think Charlie might be. We should lynch him."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
